code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import Chat from'./components/js/Chat';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Footer=()=>{const[weatherData,setWeatherData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const cities=['Seoul','Busan','Incheon'];const fetchWeatherData=async()=>{try{const responses=await Promise.all(cities.map(city=>axios.get('/api/weather',{params:{city}})));const data=responses.map(response=>response.data);setWeatherData(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching weather data:',error);}};fetchWeatherData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("footer",{className:"container footer-flow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chat,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:weatherData.map((data,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{height:"100",width:"100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("circle",{cx:"50",cy:"50",r:"40",stroke:"white",strokeWidth:"3",fill:"grey"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"card-title",children:["Weather in ",data.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Temperature: ",data.main.temp,"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Weather: ",data.weather[0].description]})]})})},index))})]});};export default Footer;
